scripts.build:admin:prod: rm -rf dist/admin && parcel build src/admin/index.html --out-dir dist/admin
scripts.build:bus:prod: rm -rf dist/bus && parcel build src/bus/index.html --out-dir dist/bus
scripts.deploy:hosting:prod: npm run build:admin:prod && npm run build:bus:prod && firebase deploy --only hosting -P default
scripts.deploy:hosting:admin:prod: npm run build:admin:prod && firebase deploy --only hosting:admin -P default
scripts.run:datamigration:dev: rm -rf dist/datamigration && tsc -p tsconfig.datamigration.json && NODE_ENV=development node dist/datamigration/datamigration/index.js
scripts.run:datamigration:prod: rm -rf dist/datamigration && tsc -p tsconfig.datamigration.json && NODE_ENV=production node dist/datamigration/datamigration/index.js
